name: civictechto-breakout-groups
title: Civic Tech Toronto - Breakout Groups
description: During the second half of Civic Tech Toronto's weekly meetups, we run a hack night. People pitch breakout groups to work and/or discuss projects of all sizes. This dataset aims to capture the history of that work.

fields.description: Formal or informal name of the project.
fields.name: project
fields.title: Project Name

fields.description: The breakout leader for this particular hack night.
fields.name: person
fields.title: Person

fields.description: Any extra contextual information specific to that hack night.
fields.name: extra
fields.title: Extra Data

fields.description: Whether the group is actively soliciting new participants, or meeting with only prior ones.
fields.name: is_onboarding
fields.title: Onboarding?

fields.description: Number of participants in the breakout, including breakout group leader.
fields.name: count
fields.title: Participant Count
